summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a wet road. Initially, the road is clear, but a white sedan appears ahead and slows down, causing the self-driving vehicle to decelerate. A yellow truck is parked on the right side of the road, partially blocking the lane. The white sedan then changes lanes to the left, moving ahead of the self-driving vehicle.
actions: The self-driving vehicle decelerates to maintain a safe distance from the white sedan ahead. The vehicles speed decreases gradually as it approaches the white sedan, which is slowing down. The self-driving vehicle maintains a safe distance and prepares to change lanes to avoid the parked yellow truck.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, slowing down and changing lanes to the left. 2) Right: A yellow truck, approximately 5 meters away, parked and partially blocking the lane.
